WorkItem.ClosedComment: We added this about a month ago
WorkItem.Description: When you load a character xml file it only checks Armory for items that are not currently in the item cache. So if it doesn't exist there (yet it does in Wowhead) it won't be able to open the file until you add the item manually.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Items] Should also check Wowhead for unknown items on loading character
